29
  • Cambridge Weekly Hack Night
    Cambridge Weekly Hack Night
    location_onCambridge Innovation Center
    date_range26.02.2017
    alarm10:30 - 11.50
    Our weekly work session will be at the Cambridge Innovation Center in Kendall Square, on the FOURTH FLOOR, in the CAFE. These Hack Nights are our time to meet in person to work on and discuss civic tech projects. Come by to say hi and hack with us! Transportation The Red Line stop for CIC
